1.title: Keeping Up with Naiah and Elli

episode of.title: Naiah and Elli Doll Show (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: A parody of "Keeping Up With The Kardashians", Naiah and Elli imagine what life would be like if they had their own reality TV show.

2.title: Committin' to Sittin'

episode of.title: Naiah and Elli Doll Show (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Naiah and Elli's parents go out of town for a business conference and Piper becomes the girls' overnight babysitter. They deal with finding their own space while respecting an adult's authority. Piper's friend Felicia brings over her kid sister, Lily, (Elli's age) to meet the girls.

3.title: Can't Sleep a Peep

episode of.title: Naiah and Elli Doll Show (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Naiah and Elli sleepover Sofia and Tiana's house; this is the first sleepover away from home for Elli and she's both excited and nervous.

4.title: Jealousy is a Brown-Eyed Cousin

episode of.title: Naiah and Elli Doll Show (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Naiah and Elli welcome their cousin Zola to their home. However, Naiah has to come to terms with sharing the spotlight with her older cousin.

5.title: Here for the Cheer

episode of.title: Naiah and Elli Doll Show (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Naiah decides to try out for the cheerleading team and has a run-in with Kit Kats, a group of mean girls led by Tabby Cat.

6.title: Cheering Blues

episode of.title: Naiah and Elli Doll Show (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Naiah finds out the results to the cheerleading tryouts, and has to say goodbye to a close friend.

7.title: Blurred Vision and Butterflies

episode of.title: Naiah and Elli Doll Show (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: Sofia confesses to having a crush, and Kim confesses to having trouble with her eyesight.

8.title: Blind and Blinded by Love

episode of.title: Naiah and Elli Doll Show (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: Sofia finally confronts her crush, Jake, and Kim confronts her mother about her blurry vision.

9.title: Litterin' and Titterin'

episode of.title: Naiah and Elli Doll Show (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: Naiah and Elli attend environmental workshops and meet some new friends and some not-so-nice friends.

10.title: Can You Keep a Secret?

episode of.title: Naiah and Elli Doll Show (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: Naiah and Elli have to say good-bye to their cousin Zola, but not before she reveals a big secret.

1.title: Movin' and Groovin'

episode of.title: Naiah and Elli Doll Show (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: In this Pilot Episode, Mommy and Daddy show the girls their new home with a House tour. Mommy sets up her closet and the girls have some fun with the neighbors.

2.title: Fussin' and Brushin'

episode of.title: Naiah and Elli Doll Show (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Just an average day for the two sisters. They wake up, have some early morning playtime,help Mommy make breakfast - eat the breakfast - brush their teeth, shower, get dressed, and finally play some more.

3.title: Dreamin' in the Evenin'

episode of.title: Naiah and Elli Doll Show (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Another average evening; following dinner is some playtime. Then the girls take a bath, brush their teeth, and hear a bedtime story as they're tucked in for bed. Lights-Out Giggle Fest prompts another bedtime story before the girls fall asleep.

4.title: Relaxin' to the Maxin'

episode of.title: Naiah and Elli Doll Show (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Mommy spends the whole day with the girls, just the three of them. They go to the salon and get their hair and nails done and then hire Dashama as their In-house masseuse. They finish the day with pizza and a movie.

5.title: Spookin' and Struttin'

episode of.title: Naiah and Elli Doll Show (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: The family decorates for Halloween/Fall and the girls try on outfits to see what they should wear for Halloween.

6.title: Spookin' and Dunkin'

episode of.title: Naiah and Elli Doll Show (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: The Family prepares and hosts a Halloween Party. Bobbing for Apples, Slimy mystery pot, dance party, snacks, and fun games add up for a great night.

7.title: Spookin' and Treatin'

episode of.title: Naiah and Elli Doll Show (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: The girls get ready to go trick-or-treating and visit all the neighborhood stops as they hope for candy.

8.title: Snackin' and Snoozin'

episode of.title: Naiah and Elli Doll Show (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: The girls invite their friends over for dinner and movie night sleepover. Silliness ensues but they settle down as they prepare for bed.

9.title: Thankin' and Prankin'

episode of.title: Naiah and Elli Doll Show (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: The Family invites over their grandparents and the girls try to discover what's in the secret family recipes.

10.title: Toothin' and Sleuthin'

episode of.title: Naiah and Elli Doll Show (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: Ellie's tooth is loose and Naiah tries to help her get it out. Once successful, the girls plot to catch the Tooth Fairy.

11.title: Dancin' and Prancin'

episode of.title: Naiah and Elli Doll Show (TV Series 2017– )

11.plot: The family gets ready for Christmas by decorating the house, and most importantly, getting a tree.

12.title: Sneezin' and Pleasin'

episode of.title: Naiah and Elli Doll Show (TV Series 2017– )

12.plot: Mommy gets sick. The girls and Daddy have to take care of her while she rests, and the girls learn different responsibilities that Mommy normally does, such as Vacuum, Mop, Laundry, and Food shopping. The girls go looking for the Anicorns they saw on TV for their friends but they are not sold in stores.

13.title: Flippin' and Twistin'

episode of.title: Naiah and Elli Doll Show (TV Series 2017– )

13.plot: Karina gives an early Christmas gift by enrolling the girls in a free class to see how they like Gymnastics. The girls prepare for their first day of class and excitement builds.

14.title: Wrappin' and Tappin'

episode of.title: Naiah and Elli Doll Show (TV Series 2017– )

14.plot: The girls set out cookies by the tree and go to bed, antsy for the morning. But they soon hear footsteps on the roof; could it be Santa!?

15.title: Tootin' and Hootin'

episode of.title: Naiah and Elli Doll Show (TV Series 2017– )

15.plot: The family hosts a casual house party and the girls are excited to see the ball drop. They play "The Last" and "The First" game and participate in some family traditions.

imdb.title: Naiah and Elli Doll Show
akas: Naiah and Elli Doll Show (United States)
plot: A young family of four moves into a new neighborhood and discovers friendships and life lessons to help them stay strong and together, as a family.::Cari Favole
